violations.errorMessage: Disable automatic volume mount of Service Account token in Containers
violations.configGap: Disable automatic volume mount of Service Account token in Containers
violations.configFix: Set statefulSet[0].Spec.Template.Spec.AutomountServiceAccountToken to False to prevent automatic creation of Service Account token volume mount. By default, every pod is created with a default Service Account. API credentials required by this Service Account are mounted in the containers by default, allowing pods to communicate with the Kubernetes API server. Disabling statefulSet[0].Spec.Template.Spec.AutomountServiceAccountToken would prevent accidental access to the Service Account's API credentials
